page.title: 04THE TOWER .GARTH
page.content: I live next to a{Hunting Tower}which} was built in 1827{.Mrs. Whitworth}owns it and she is now ninety years of age. In the I95O's someone stole the lead off the roof and so now water comes through and it has rotted all the wooden floors.The Tower was {vandalized}and the windows were smashed and plaster fell off the walls.Mrs. Whitworth used to own all the houses such as{Penybryn Hall}and even the{Brick Works. } The house that i live in has fifteen rooms,it's a big house and there are two cellars.At the bottom of the garden are the dog kennels and to the left of them there is a pheasant breeding ground.My address is{Tower {Cottage ,GARTH,TREVOR, LLANGOLLEN. My name is JAMES RIGBY and i am eleven years of age.I have a brother called Marcus and he is nine years old.
